DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator use clinical documentation image data MRI research . Clinical subject divide two group : osteoarthritis patient healthy control without osteoarthritis . Differences MRI data study two group .
DOC.detailed_description: In study , investigator apply high precision MRI technique ( less slice thickness 0.35 mm without inter-slice gap ) , calculate IPFP maximal sagittal area IPFP volume , also quantitated signal , compare difference healthy control osteoarthritis patient . This observational cross-sectional study without specific intervention subject . MRI regular examination hospital . And subject include reason osteoarthritis ( need MRI ) healthy control ( pain osteoarthritis , also need MRI ) . The investigator assign specific intervention subject study .
DOC.criteria: Patients clinical knee osteoarthritis ; The healthy control require MRI test . Contraindications magnetic resonance imaging ; Rheumatoid arthritis patient ; Gout ; Hemophilic arthritis ; Subjects take nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) ; Subjects take lipidlowering agent ; Subjects history knee trauma ; Subjects history knee operation ; Subjects disease musculoskeletal tumor near knee ; Subjects joint loose body .
